rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0001
rows.name: Rex, did you live here?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0002
rows.name:
No, this was more like a hideout...
kind of like a secret base.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0003
rows.name:
I had Gramps dock at the cliff ahead,
and the two of us lived together.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0004
rows.name: What kind of kid were you, Rex?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0005
rows.name: That's hard to answer...

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0006
rows.name: You're interested too, right Nia?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0007
rows.name:
I-I guess...
sounds kind of interesting.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0008
rows.name:
Let me tell you about what
Rex was like as a child.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0009
rows.name:
Well... he was a mischievous
or rahther a reckless child.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0010
rows.name:
Despite his small size, he had a strong
sense of justice and was always
picking fights with the local bullies.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0011
rows.name: Was I really like that?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0012
rows.name:
So you were full of energy
since you were little!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0013
rows.name:
Sounds like you were
a real troublemaker.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0014
rows.name: You two seem quite intrigued.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0015
rows.name:
Well then...
how about I tell you two
my favorite story about Rex?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0016
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0017
rows.name: W-wait a minute!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0018
rows.name:
There's no big story
or anything, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0101
rows.name: What do you mean, a special story!?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0102
rows.name:
One day, one of the bullies
was attacked by a monster.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0103
rows.name:
He rushed out alone,
ignoring everyone
who tried to stop him.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0104
rows.name:
...You've always been so reckless,
haven't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0105
rows.name:
What's the big deal?
Of course I'm going to help
someone in danger!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0106
rows.name: So what happened?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0107
rows.name:
Both of them were safely
rescued by the villagers.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0108
rows.name: Huh? Didn't Rex go to help?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0109
rows.name:
He failed.
The rescuer ended up
needing rescue himself.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0110
rows.name: Wow, that's uncool.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0111
rows.name:
That night,
Rex was sobbing loudly at home.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0112
rows.name:
I asked if his injuries
were causing him pain...

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0113
rows.name:
He said he was upset because he hadn't
been able to save his friend.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0114
rows.name:
He wasn't concerned about his injuries
or fear. He was devastated that
he couldn't save his friend.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0115
rows.name: Hmm, interesting.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0116
rows.name:
H-hey... I was just a kid!
Crying is normal at that age, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0117
rows.name:
No, that's not it.
Nia is actually impressed by you.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0118
rows.name: Right?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0119
rows.name: Sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0120
rows.name:
I was just thinking how brave
you've been since you were a kid.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0121
rows.name: That's really admirable!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0122
rows.name: This is... kind of embarrassing.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0123
rows.name:
Ho ho ho!
That was a nice story, wasn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0201
rows.name: Gramps tends to exaggerate, you know.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0202
rows.name:
In that case, should I tell them
about the time you wet yourself out
of fear during a monster attack?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0203
rows.name: What? No, that's not...

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0204
rows.name: W-wet himself...?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0205
rows.name: That's uncool.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0206
rows.name:
I-it was when I was little!
I don't do that anymore!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0207
rows.name:
Come on, Gramps!
Don't tell that story!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0208
rows.name: Oh come on, let's hear it!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0209
rows.name:
No! Homura, back me up here,
would you?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0210
rows.name:
Well... I'm actually
kind of curious to hear it.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0211
rows.name: Huh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0212
rows.name:
This happened when a bully that
Rex didn't get along with was
attacked by a monster.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0213
rows.name:
He recklessly ran out
of the village alone...

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0214
rows.name: Gramps, please stop!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0215
rows.name:
Is wetting yourself
really such a big deal?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0216
rows.name:
Of course it's embarrassing!
I bet even Nia did it
when she was little!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0218
rows.name: Maybe we should hear a different story.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0219
rows.name:
Oh? Would you rather hear
something even more embarrassing?

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0220
rows.name:
No, that's not what I meant!
Homura, why would you say that?!

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0221
rows.name:
What? I just want to know as much
as possible about you, Rex...

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0222
rows.name:
She's right. Drivers and Blades
should know each other well.

rows.label: kizunatalk033_msg0223
rows.name:
You don't need to know about this!
Enough already!
